code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{mlPredict}from"../api";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Prediction(_ref){let{selectedIPO}=_ref;const[prediction,setPrediction]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[error,setError]=useState("");const handlePredict=async()=>{setError("");setPrediction(null);setLoading(true);try{const features={"Issue_Size(crores)":selectedIPO['Issue_Size(crores)'],"QIB":selectedIPO.QIB,"HNI":selectedIPO.HNI,"RII":selectedIPO.RII,"Issue_price":selectedIPO.Issue_price};const res=await mlPredict(features);setPrediction(res.predicted_listing_gain_percent);}catch(e){setError("Prediction failed.");}setLoading(false);};if(!selectedIPO)return null;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginBottom:16},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"ML: Predict IPO Listing Gain"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handlePredict,disabled:loading,children:loading?"Predicting...":"Predict"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{color:"red",marginTop:8},children:error}),prediction!==null&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{marginTop:8},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("b",{children:"Predicted Gain:"})," ",prediction,"% (on listing)"]})]});}
